casebody.data:
No. 10-10053. Eric Gearod Scarlett, Petitioner v. Edwin G. Buss, Secretary, Florida Department of Corrections, et al. 564 U.S. 1008, 131 S. Ct. 3000,

180 L. Ed. 2d 829,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4382. June 13, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.

Same case below, 404 Fed. Appx. 394.
